item.title: The Reproducibility Crisis
item.description: Teaser text or links here. Breakthroughs in fields with new experiments and results can be an exciting time, however, a survey from Nature journal is shedding light on reproducibility of experiments. Scientists have attempted to reproduce the scientific literature of other scientists or their own and most of the time the results fail to replicate the study. Why is research so difficult to replicate? This is a link to Google
